title: Object with symbolic meaning in Chinese culture

content.question: Task 4: Cultural Presentation You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read the topic of your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Topic of presentation: Choose ONE object that has symbolic meaning in Chinese culture (such as tangyuan, longevity peach [shoutao], mandarin ducks [yuanyang], etc.). In your presentation, describe this object and explain its significance.

frqParts.text: Task 4: Cultural Presentation You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read the topic of your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Topic of presentation: Choose ONE object that has symbolic meaning in Chinese culture (such as tangyuan, longevity peach [shoutao], mandarin ducks [yuanyang], etc.). In your presentation, describe this object and explain its significance.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
